C

collectResults(Space) - Method in class jobs.EuclideanTspJob
Collects the computed result that represents the composed result of the execution of all the tasks The result in the EuclideanTSP job is a map of the minimal tour among the permutations computed by the tasks and the cost involved for that tour.
collectResults(Space) - Method in class jobs.FibonacciJob
 
collectResults(Space) - Method in interface jobs.Job
Collects result(s) from the Space, obtaining the composed result of execution of all the subtasks.
collectResults(Space) - Method in class jobs.MandelbrotSetJob
The result in the MandelbrotSet job is a Map of row number and the one-dimensional array that contains the 'k' values of for that row.

The lower bound is computed by adding up the euclidean distance between the nodes in the path from root.

Computer - Interface in system
This is the remote interface through which different tasks can be executed by the ComputeSpace.
Computer2Space - Interface in system
The remote interface that the ComputeServers use to communicate with the ComputeSpace.
ComputerImpl - Class in system
This class enables different tasks to be executed by the Compute Space using its remote reference (proxy) These tasks are run using the task's implementation of the execute method and the results are returned to the Compute Space.
ComputerImpl() - Constructor for class system.ComputerImpl
Instantiates a new implementation object for the Computer Interface.

EuclideanTspJob - Class in jobs
This class represents the entire work involved in solving a Traveling Salesman Problem (TSP), where the cities are points in the 2D Euclidean plane.

EuclideanTSPSolution - Class in solution
The EuclideanTSPSolution represents the partial tour (from the root to the current node) in the search tree of a Traveling Salesman Problem (TSP).

MandelbrotSetJob - Class in jobs
This class helps to produce a visualization of the some part of the Mandelbrot set which is probably one of the most well known fractals, and probably one of the most widely implemented fractal in fractal plotting programs.
